lines.Line: You wanna go in the bedroom? It’s a little more comfortable

lines.Line: Okay. So, this wire is connected to this wire which plugs into here.NEWLINE(She points at each as she says it.) lines.Line: Okay! Feel free to look, but I’m telling you those contracts are notNEWLINEon this desk

lines.Line: Okay, this is where you and I part ways. (She drops the blanket into theNEWLINEchute.) Noisy bitch
